about_the_game:
Sometimes even demons want pizza, and it's your job to help the delivery guy safely bring it directly into the depths of hell, where some demons long for some human cuisine.

Hell's Delivery is a platform puzzle game, your objective is to deliver pizza to demons in hell. You can't control the delivery guy, but you have a inventory with helpful tools to place along the way to help him through the depths of hell.

When the game starts the delivery guy will wait at the entrance of hell, along the path will exist traps, with tools at your disposal in the inventory, you will need to select the right ones and place along the way helping him overcome those challenges. When you're done, just hit the ready button and the delivery guy will start running to do his job, if everything goes smoothly, the pizza will be delivered and you go to next phase, in case you fail, you can learn what has gone wrong and edit the tools placed.

name: Hell's Delivery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280X
  • Storage: 302 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8300H
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 302 MB available space
